channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK snow: Met Office's verdict on whether or not we'll see a white November
item.description: Some parts of the country might experience snow at the beginning of November, but this will mainly be limited to high ground in the far north and nort...

item.title: Killer locked boyfriend in suitcase and laughed as he suffocated to death in twisted video
item.description: Sarah Boone, 47, was left 'shocked' when a jury found her guilty of second-degree murder - after she trapped and suffocated her boyfriend after zippin...

item.title: Woman finds strange metal rod baked into her Pizza Hut takeaway
item.description: The fast food giant refused to give her a refund.

item.title: Southport attack suspect Axel Rudakubana refuses to speak in court on terror charge
item.description: Axel Rudakubana, 18, appeared at Westminster Magistrates’ Court via videolink from HMP Belmarsh and sat holding his sweater over the bottom half of hi...

item.title: Pregnant Emma Atkinson 'had to be IDed by heartbroken father' after fall from 9th floor flat
item.description: Pregnant mum Emma Atkinson died after falling 90ft from a window in the tower block where her father David Atkinson lives - and he formally identified...

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: Superdrug selling 'confidence-boosting' designer perfume for £25 - it was £72
item.description: Superdrug has discounted the £72 fragrance to just £25.60, giving customers a better than half price saving in time for Christmas
